definition: to determine/to fix upon/to set (a target, a price etc)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: Don't determine the position in accordance with few radar information.
sentences.chinese: 不要由少量雷达数据定出船位。

sentences.english: It sets out tax policy for the year. Since 1997 there has also been a pre-budget report.
sentences.chinese: 预算定出本年的税收政策。

sentences.english: Owners decide hourly rental rate and the companies cover the insurance.
sentences.chinese: 车主可以随时定出租金率而后由公司来购买保险。

sentences.english: Or kings be breakers of their own behests ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么帝王要违犯自己定出的法规？

sentences.english: It helps them to measure the profitability of products, establish break-even points and so on.
sentences.chinese: 还帮助他们估量产品的盈利能力，定出持平点等等。

sentences.english: The invention is simple to realize and easy to test, can determine the total reflection angle precisely and increase sensing accuracy and sensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 能精确定出全反射角，提高了传感精度和灵敏度。

sentences.english: Is there any way of determining the speech of the car from the reading on the mileage meter.
sentences.chinese: 有没有办法从哩程表的读数定出汽车的速率。

sentences.english: They opposed the creation of a lot of restrictions to tie the hands of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 他们反对定出许多条条框框来捆住群众的手脚。

sentences.english: The initial PID setting are given by the method based on GPM.
sentences.chinese: 用GPM法整定出PID控制器参数的初始值。

sentences.english: Using the Index of Coincidence to identify Open Reading Frames.
sentences.chinese: 使用偶合指数方法来定出开放读码框架。

definition: to lay down (a rule, a plan of action)/to draw up/booked out (i.e. already fully booked)
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
to reach a verdict/to conclude a judgment
